item.title: GPU Hardware Specs Manual
item.description: NVIDIA GTX 1050 This GPU is built using NVIDIA’s Pascal architecture, a successor of Maxwell which was introduced in 2016. General Specs GPU Architecture: Pascal CUDA Cores: 640 Standard Memory: 2GB GDDR5 Memory Speed: 7GB/s Memory Interface Width: 128 bit Memory Bandwidth (GB/s): 112 Base Clock: 1354 Mhz Boost Clock: 1455 Mhz Supported Technologies CUDA 3DVision Physix NVDIA G-Synch ShadoWorks OpenGL Display & Resolution Max Resolution 7680*4320@60Hz Ports: DP1.
